metadata.title: Escort Duty for Multiverse
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex, DryEagle, Vertaalfout, RAD-82
metadata.description: One of the classics from DryEagle, the original version of this mod pushed the bounds of what was possible in FTL long before Hyperspace came around. Now given a fresh coat of paint and enhanced with some of that Hyperspace magic, this ship and its charge are ready to explore the Multiverse!
